name: Stinky Snake (itch)
description: Stinky Snake is a 2D platformer family adventure game. The main character Snake was shipwrecked on an island alongside his family, a dog named Angel and a human child named Puppy. When Puppy and Angel are kidnapped by a skunk, Snake must fight his way through the rest of the skunks that reside on the island. However, once Snake has found his family, the story is not over. Snake realizes that the leader of the skunks is his sister and she isn’t the biggest threat he must face. He also learns that the cart he used to complete his quest was cursed by the witch who gave it to him, which was the reason that he couldn’t go in sea water. Now, he needs to complete the Colonizer’s quest in order to break this curse. The game features several topical locations, and takes place on The Emerald Isle, Montserrat.
